body:
Hi Peter,

dmtxOptPar has its own input. You're changing the radOptPar which will be used for Rtrace. If you want to change the parameters for daylight matrix (rfluxmtx) then you need to use dmtxOptPar input.



PS: I will answer to your other question with an example code soon. The short answer is that the error happens because Annual Recipe by design cannot to handle window groups. That's why it only inputs the first group of results.
